original_text: He shall come into the glorious land. And tens of thousands shall fall, but these shall be delivered out of his hand: Edom and Moab and the main part of the Ammonites.
korean_text: 그가 또 영화로운 땅에 들어갈 것이요 많은 나라를 패망하게 할 것이나 오직 에돔과 모압과 암몬 자손의 지도자들은 그의 손에서 벗어나리라

sentences.original_text: He shall come into the glorious land.
And tens of thousands shall fall,
but these shall be delivered out of his hand:
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이들은 그의 손에서 건져질 것입니다:

sentences.original_text: and the main part of the Ammonites.
